main event: A civilian observed a UFO with a trail of red, blue, and yellow colors in Santa Monica, California on August 6, 1956.
interesting points: The UFO climbed in altitude before descending south in a zig-zag pattern,The observation lasted for about 15 minutes,The sighting was classified as a ground-visual observation,The report mentions that the description may fit an unconventional jet aircraft,The object was observed traveling south from Venice.
sighted object: one UFO with a colorful trail
